text: (Bona)ngabobayabakhutshwakumawabokungengabulungisa kodwa ngenxa yokuba besithi: “INkosi yethu nguAllâh.” Kananjalo ukuba ngaba uAllâh Ebengaphenyi abantu ngabanye, bekuya kudilika imizi yokuhlala oonongendi, iicawa, iitempile zamaYuda, neemasjid apho igama lika-Allâh likhankanywa khona kakhulu (lidunyiswe). Kwaye uAllâh Uza kubaxhasa ngenene abo baMxhasayo. Inene uAllâh Unamandla yaye Mkhulu, Unobunganga
